game.name: Ducklings Maze
game.desc: Embark on a feathered adventure in Ducklings Maze, where you play as a courageous duck on a mission to rescue your adorable ducklings and lead them safely back home through a challenging maze. Inspired by the fairy tale "Den grimme aelling" by Hans Christian Andersen, the game is a medium/high difficulty maze with all the elements that an 80s arcade game requires.
